meanings.sent1: The filigreed jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had a filigreed frame.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so filigreed with frosting that it looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a filigreed tapestry, weaving together intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The filigreed lace curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Decorated with intricate patterns or designs
meanings.sent1: The filigreed gate at the entrance was a work of art.
meanings.sent2: The filigreed wallpaper gave the room a luxurious feel.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur was so filigreed with patterns that it looked like a tiny masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The music was like a filigreed melody, each note carefully crafted.
meanings.sent5: The filigreed carvings on the wooden chest were mesmerizing to look at.
